Numina Reference¶

Release:0.20
Date:Mar 01, 2019

Warning

This “Reference” is still a work in progress; some of the material is not organized, and several aspects of Numina are not yet covered sufficient detail.

  • Numina modules
    • numina.array — Array manipulation
    • numina.core — Core classes for Pipelines
    • numina.dal — Calibration fetching
    • numina.datamodel — Model of data
    • numina.drps — Loading DRPS
    • numina.exceptions — Numina exceptions
    • numina.frame — Frame manipulation
    • numina.logger — Logging utilities
    • numina.modeling — Model for fitting
    • numina.core.qc — Quality Control for Numina
    • numina.store — Serialization of products
    • numina.treedict — Recursive dictionary
    • numina.types — Data types
    • numina.user — CLI interface
    • numina.util — Generic utilities
    • numina.visualization — Data visualization
    • numina.user.xdgdirs — Base Directories
